name: Ushi
description:
When your active character takes DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.
Usage(s): 1. When the Usage is depleted, this card will not be discarded.
Can be triggered once while this Summon is present: When your character takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains Superlative Superstrength.
End Phase: Discard this card, deal 1 Geo DMG.
